webcrawler

Class SpiderMan

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.concurrent.ForkJoinTask<Void>
      • java.util.concurrent.RecursiveAction
        • webcrawler.SpiderMan
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Future<Void>, WebCrawler
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    TermsCounter

    public abstract class SpiderMan
extends RecursiveAction
implements WebCrawler

    SpiderMan, SpiderMan does whatever a spider can,
    spins a web any size, catches thieves just like flies.
    Look out! Here comes the SpiderMan!

    See Also:

        Description copied from interface: WebCrawler

        follow - true if the crawler should recursively follow links
        depth - the depth of external link recursion
